page.title: 02Nunsthorpe housing estate.
page.content: The{Nunsthorpe}housing estate is a large{council}estate.It was built over a number of years.The first houses on the estate were built in{1925,}and the rest of the estate was gradually developed up until the present date. New houses are still being built on the edge of the existing estate.A very large new private housing estate to be called{Scartho Top}is to be developed to the south of{Nunsthorpe.} Our school was opened in {September 1931,}and was originally an all age school, to serve the new housing estate. At one time there were over{1,000}children in the school. Today it is just a{Middle school}with {348}pupils on roll. Seperate{nursery and{infant}schools have been built on the same site.
